00001 #include <windows.h>
00002 #include "timer.h"
00003 
00004 Timer::Timer()
00005 {
00006     frames = 0;
00007     frametime = 0;
00008     Time = 0;
00009     fps = 0;
00010 
00011     if (!QueryPerformanceFrequency((LARGE_INTEGER *) &Frequency))
00012     {
00013         // no performance counter available, you might be using Windows 98 osr1
00014         Resolution = 0.001f;
00015         PerformanceTimerEnabled = 0;
00016     }
00017     else
00018     { 
00019         PerformanceTimerEnabled = 1;
00020 
00021                 // get 32 out of the 64 time bits such that we have around
00022                 // 1 microsecond resolution
00023         unsigned int lowpart = (unsigned int)Frequency.LowPart;
00024         unsigned int highpart = (unsigned int)Frequency.HighPart;
00025 
00026         lowshift = 0;
00027 
00028         while (highpart || (lowpart > 2000000.0))
00029         {
00030             lowshift++;
00031             lowpart >>= 1;
00032             lowpart |= (highpart & 1) << 31;
00033             highpart >>= 1;
00034         }
00035 
00036         Resolution = 1.0/(double)lowpart;
00037     }
00038 }
00039

00041 {
00042 }
00043 
00044 int Timer::Refresh()
00045 {
00046     LARGE_INTEGER   count;
00047     unsigned int    temp, t2;
00048 
00049     if (PerformanceTimerEnabled)
00050     {   
00051         QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER *) &count);
00052         
00053                 temp = ((unsigned int)count.LowPart >> lowshift) |
00054                            ((unsigned int)count.HighPart << (32 - lowshift));
00055 
00056         if (frames == 0 || (temp <= oldTime))
00057         {
00058             oldTime = temp;
00059         }
00060         else
00061         {
00062             t2 = temp - oldTime;
00063             frametime = (double)t2 * Resolution;
00064             Time += frametime;
00065 
00066             oldTime = temp;
00067 
00068             if (Time == lastTime)
00069             {
00070                 sametimecount++;
00071 
00072                 if (sametimecount > 100000)
00073                 {
00074                     Time += 1;
00075                     sametimecount = 0;
00076                 }
00077             }
00078             else sametimecount = 0;
00079 
00080             lastTime = Time;
00081         }
00082         frames++;
00083     }
00084     else
00085     {
00086         if(frames == 0)
00087         {
00088             lastTime = Time = timeGetTime() * Resolution;
00089             frametime = 0;
00090         }
00091         else
00092         {
00093             lastTime = Time;
00094             Time = timeGetTime() * Resolution;
00095             frametime = Time - lastTime;
00096         }
00097     }
00098 
00099     fps = int(1.0 / frametime);
00100     frames++;
00101     return frames;
00102 }
